sentence.Network_en: Try to keep a clear-sighted view of your objective.
sentence.Network_cn: 对目标要有明确的认识。

sentence.Network_en: He was clear-sighted enough to keep a sense of perspective.
sentence.Network_cn: 他很有见识，能保持正确的判断力。

sentence.Network_en: A fleet of French ships was sighted in the North Sea.
sentence.Network_cn: 在北海突然发现了一支法国船队。

entry.tran: 有视力的;看得见的;不盲的
entry.def: Sighted people have the ability to see. This word is usually used to contrast people who can see with people who are blind.

example.ex: Blind children tend to be more passive in this area of motor development than sighted children.
example.tran: 失明的孩子在动作发展的这一方面往往比不失明的孩子更加被动。
